home.title: Welcome to Javaniko Calendar!
home.subtitle: Do you want to indicate how was your day, but you dont know how? Javaniko Calendar is your choice!

logged.message: You are logged in as user "{{username}}".

introduccion.title: What is Javaniko Calendar?
introduccion.text: Javaniko Calendar is a platform where you can create projects using Scrum, with a workspace to link your projects, related sprints for each project, and the exclusive option in the platform, get a Niko Niko calendar for each sprint to monitor the team satisfaction with the done work. There is also available an option to see the statistics of workspaces, proyects and sprints to analyze all of the content.

workspaces.title: Set up your work
workspaces.text: Start your work making up the workspace for you and your team.

proyectos.title: Create projects easily
proyectos.text: Create projects from scratch from your work environment and your associated workspace.

sprints.title: See progress thanks to sprints
sprints.text: Use sprints to keep full track of tasks and Burn-Down graph to see story points remaining.

estadisticas.title: Analyze all the content
estadisticas.text: Monitor your work thanks to our graphs for workspaces, projects, sprints and custom graphs for each user.

calendario.title: Express your emotions
calendario.text: Thanks to the exclusive functionality of the application, you can describe how was your day using emojis in our Niko Niko Calendars.
